# Strings Docs

> Documentation for Strings Docs.

- [Converting between strings and other data types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/converting-between-strings-and-other-data-types.md): Learn more about: Converting between strings and other data types in Visual Basic

- [How to: Convert an Array of Bytes into a String](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-to-convert-an-array-of-bytes-into-a-string.md): Learn more about: How to: Convert an Array of Bytes into a String in Visual Basic
- [How to: Convert Hexadecimal Strings to Numbers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-to-convert-hexadecimal-strings-to-numbers.md): Learn more about: How to: Convert Hexadecimal Strings to Numbers (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Convert Strings into an Array of Bytes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-to-convert-strings-into-an-array-of-bytes.md): Learn more about: How to: Convert Strings into an Array of Bytes in Visual Basic
